short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically declines to send read receipts in Google Mail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Has your Google Apps administrator enabled read receipts for your domain? Are you fed up of clicking 'Not now' every time Google Mail asks you whether it should send a read receipt? Do you wish there was a global 'don't send read receipts' setting?

If so, this extension is for you! When you install it, it will automatically choose 'Not now' every time you're asked whether to send a read receipt, and it's so fast you won't even see the dialog.

If you don't trust me, and want to see the source, it's at

https://github.com/stephenlewis/no-read-receipts

N.B. this extension is only useful for Google Apps users who have read receipts enabled - it's not for 'consumer' GMail accounts.
